description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPandemonium Rebirth:
After this creature dies, your other creatures are resurrected with 100% {STAT_health}. If they're not dead, they recover 50% {STAT_health}. This effect does not activate if more than one of your creatures has this trait.
name: Pandemonium Bead
